channel.title: smh.com.au Business News.
channel.description: The latest business news from smh.com.au. For all the business news, visit http://business.smh.com.au/

item.title: Ignore the doomsayers
item.description: Poor Rick Perry, in trouble after he could only remember two of the three federal agencies that he wants to scrap.

item.title: Will Italy tip Europe over the edge?
item.description: The euro zone crisis could take Australia along for the ride, writes Richard Webb.

item.title: A King's ransom slashed by $11m
item.description: The board of Leighton Holdings will deny former boss Wal King a $5 million transition bonus.

item.title: ANZ boss up for $3.15m incentive deal
item.description: ANZ will seek its shareholders' approval to top up chief executive Mike Smith's incentive deal.

item.title: Bright ideas need nurturing
item.description: Paddy Miller has been tracking corporate leaders for 20 years, watching their every move.
